experimental.propagation.description: Number of times an experimental propagation is used

queue.enqueued.spans.description: Counts the number of spans being queued for sending

queue.max_length.description: Measures the maximum capacity of the traceProcessingWorker queue

queue.partial.traces.description: Counts the number of dropped traces that are queued for sending tagged by sampling decision after single span sampling. NOTE: These traces are not included in queue.enqueued.traces

source.mapping.limit.reached.description: Number of times the source mapping limit has been reached

tainted.flat.mode.description: Number of times the tainted map has switched to flat mode
